name: Banshee
pros: Exceptional scaling with merge ranks, versatile copy mechanics
cons: High mana cost, requires strategic positioning

talents.name: Copy Unit

talents.name: Charge Amplification

description: A legendary utility unit that creates copies of merged units. Tesla's power scales dramatically with merge ranks, transforming from a single-charge unit to a devastating multi-charge powerhouse with exponentially increasing damage per second.

scaling_notes.damage_scaling: Base damage increases by ~35 per mana level
scaling_notes.charge_scaling: Charge damage increases by ~35 per mana level
scaling_notes.merge_scaling: Each merge rank adds +1 max charge and reduces attack speed for multiplicative DPS gains
scaling_notes.card_level_scaling: Higher card levels increase hero cooldown reduction and base damage values
